Name: Cognitive_Load_Decomposer
Purpose: Decompose investing-related analysis paralysis into discrete cognitive load components and prioritize them by impact on decision blockage
Deliverables: Structured taxonomy of cognitive barriers (e.g., option overload, concept complexity, abstraction level mismatch) represented as hierarchical clusters with severity scores and interdependency mappings
Strengths: Effective at separating intertwined cognitive issues into smaller, classifiable units; reveals which types of information and interface complexity most directly cause decision freeze; clarifies which cognitive loads can be removed, sequenced, or transformed
Watch-out: Can over-fragment barriers into too many micro-categories, losing sight of how they combine in real user experiences; may underweight emotional and social factors if they do not map cleanly to cognitive dimensions
